title: Prevent tab openning with new version content
content:
Hello,

When Firefox updates, a new tab is openned upon the next start, with the new version content or patchnote. I would like to avoid this informative tab.

Is there a way to deactivate it?

Thank you in advance.
creator: lcj.calvet

title: did the update for FF
content: I did the firefox update, and it crashed my pc, upon restarting pc and then firefox, it opens but it shows nothing, just a white search bar and everything else is grey. to be honest if i lose my browsing history and other saved stuff on this, FF won't be my default browser again.
creator: big_brother514

title: unable to download a book Funny Money
content:
Secure Connection Failed

An error occurred during a connection to mc.ht. PR_END_OF_FILE_ERROR

   The page you are trying to view cannot be shown because the authenticity of the received data could not be verified.    Please contact the website owners to inform them of this problem.
creator: lhtorres2000

title: I can't open my gmail on firefox.
content:
I am not able to open my gmail account on firefox. It was working fine but suddenly it started showing errors. The error which is showing is-

We've detected a problem with your cookie settings. Enable cookies

Make sure your cookies are enabled. To enable cookies, follow these browser-specific instructions. Clear cache and cookies

If you have cookies enabled but are still having trouble, clear your browser's cache and cookies. Adjust your privacy settings

If clearing your cache and cookies doesn't resolve the problem, try adjusting your browser's privacy settings. If your settings are on high, manually add www.google.com to your list of allowed sites. Learn more

I have already tried to do all this which is written but still it dosen't get resolved.
creator: tejassvirsingh14

title: Problemas para descargar vídeos de Yotube
content:
Hola, tengo instalada la extensión IDM pero no me permite descargar vídeos de Youtube. Me pone el siguiente error:

No se puede descargar este archivo. Detalles: HTTP/1.1 400 Bad Requested

Necesito saber que puedo hacer, el problema es solo con Youtube, de otros sitios sí me permite realizar las descargas. Espero me puedan ayudar a solucionar este problema. Gracias.
creator: leydis951223

title: Firefox has lost sound since updating late night
content: All sites run though Firefox have lost sound since updating late night, but they work fine if a different browser
creator: Saito_Masaki

title: Log in to samsung account
content: I have not been able to log into my samsung account while using firefox. There is some sort of issue when you enter the email and password you click ok and it sends you to another 2 step verification process where it sends u a code to either email or phone and when i enter the number i get the below error and code msg. If i use chrome however it works just fine. Oh and if you think its the antivirus it is not i just installed it and its been this way for way longer.
creator: jlovesmonica

title: installing Firefox on WIN 11 laptop
content: Can't install Firefox on new WIN 11 laptop. Every attempt leads to the Microsoft store which no longer has Firefox in it or to a dialog that says Firefox is not a Microsoft-certified app. I REALLY don't want to use Edge! Thanks in advance for your help. Steve [email removed from public]
creator: sb48

title: FireFox 110 on Mac Ventura : add ons not showing in toolbar
content:
FireFox 110 on Mac Ventura : add ons are NOT showing in toolbar. Have tried several methods explained on the web, still not showing. Not even after Allowing the Add on to run in Private Windows. Also tried to reinstall add ons; even after FireFox Refresh ...

I have FireFox 110 also running on Mac High Sierra with add ons showing perfectly in the toolbar.
creator: FrancisD

title: DNA section as Ancestry suddenly unviewable
content: Suddenly yesterday (I believe after a Firefox update to 110.0) Ancestry.ca stopped working in the DNA section. I have turned off Mozilla VPN, cleared Cache and Cookies, rebooted several times, but it's still not viewable beyond 2nd click in DNA section. The rest of Ancestry is working fine: can search, add to trees, etc. I checked with Ancestry and they say my account is fine from their end; plus it works find on Chrome. I am a Firefox fan and hate the thought of using anything else and use Ancestry daily. Any help appreciated; Singer35
creator: singer35
